name: fullstack-ts-with-render-and-gh-pages
description: This will be a demo for setting up a fullstack react app using TS, which will have an express server hosted on render.com and the frontend hosted on Github pages

scripts.dev: nodemon -e js,mjs,cjs,json,ts --watch backend/src --exec node --env-file .env --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning --loader ts-node/esm backend/src/index.ts
